meanings.definition: A set of connected things or parts forming a complex whole.
meanings.sent1: The solar system includes the sun, planets, and moons.
meanings.sent2: The circulatory system in our bodies helps transport blood.
meanings.sent3: The alarm system in the house went off when the cat tried to sneak in.
meanings.sent4: Her family was like a well-oiled system, each member playing a crucial role.
meanings.sent5: The nervous system is like a network of messengers sending signals throughout the body.

meanings.definition: A method or procedure for achieving something.
meanings.sent1: Following a strict study system helped him ace the exam.
meanings.sent2: The recycling system in our community encourages environmental sustainability.
meanings.sent3: Her baking system involved precise measurements and a lot of patience.
meanings.sent4: The legal system ensures justice is served in society.
meanings.sent5: The voting system allows citizens to have a say in government decisions.

meanings.sent1: The school system includes different grade levels and subjects.
meanings.sent2: The transportation system in the city consists of buses, trains, and subways.
meanings.sent3: His cleaning system involved color-coding and specific tasks for each day.
meanings.sent4: The political system determines how leaders are chosen and policies are made.
meanings.sent5: The communication system at work ensures messages are relayed efficiently.
